user.title: Set up Traccar
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up Traccar?

abort.not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive messages from Traccar.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup the webhook feature in Traccar.

Use the following url: `{webhook_url}`

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
